creditline: Gift of Mrs. Christian H. Aall in memory of her grandparents Mr. and Mrs. M. J. Scanlon
description: Three Plates, Chinese Export, porcelain painted in underglaze blue with European flowers including an iris surrounded by a strapwork border, traces of gilding.
text: This plate clearly indicates that there were different levels of execution for similar designs commissioned by westerners from the Chinese merchants.
title: Plate
